Module Software2
Package sample.view_controller

Class AddCustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.view_controller.AddCustomerController
  • public class AddCustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class define the view and behaviors of the addCustomersView.FXML and the users interactions with the addCustomerView user interface.
    Author:
    Tchaikousky Thomas

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        This method sets the scene's fields before the scene is loaded. The labels are set based on the user's default locale. All first level divisions from the database with the three possible country ids are added, and then divided into separate observable list.

      • handleCancelButton

        void handleCancelButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        This method determines the action taken after the cancel button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        event - The action event.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • handleCountrySelection

        void handleCountrySelection()
        This method determines the action taken when a country is selected from the country combobox. The country's selection determines the list that is populated in the division combobox.

      • handleSaveButton

        void handleSaveButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles the action taken after pressing the save button. After the button is pressed all of the field are checked to ensure all of the fields have been correctly filled and if so proceeds to create the customer object and save it to the database.
        Parameters:
        event - The action event.

      • getDivisionID

        public int getDivisionID​(java.lang.String selectedDivision,
                         javafx.collections.ObservableList<FirstLevelDivision> observable)
        This method takes the selected division out of the division combobox and returns the division id.
        Parameters:
        selectedDivision - The division that was selected.
        observable - The observable list that the division belongs to.
        Returns:
        divisionID

      • handleAppointmentsButton

        private void handleAppointmentsButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles the action taken after pressing the appointments button. The appointmentsView.fxml is loaded
        Parameters:
        event - The action event.

      • handleCustomersButton

        private void handleCustomersButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles the action taken after pressing the customers button. The customersView.fxml is loaded
        Parameters:
        event - The action event.

      • handleReportsButton

        private void handleReportsButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method handles the action taken after pressing the reports button. The reportsView.fxml is loaded
        Parameters:
        event - The action event.

      • setUser

        public void setUser​(User user)
        This method receives an User object from the previous scene and sets it as the User object for this scene.
        Parameters:
        user - The user that was passed from the previous scene.
